info.name: Debian the Gray
info.description: Turn some of the Debian websites (developer related) dark gray, usable at night and with tired eyes. If you happen to have patches to improve some more Debian's sites, please send them my way!
info.additionalInfo:
2018-10-01
* Quite more sites supported.

2017-04-02
* Support more sites.
* Change the colour of monospaced words in wiki.debian.org.

2017-05-21
* Initial upload.
